Axes.Name: Axes
Axes.Description: Needed to learn axe skills. Passively increases damage dealt with axes.

SwordsL.Name: Swords
SwordsL.Description: Needed to learn sword skills. Passively increases damage dealt with swords.

Counter.Name: Counter
Counter.Description: Chance to counter physical damage, even if damage was blocked.

2HitL.Name: 2-Hit
2HitL.Description: Normal weapon attacks have a chance of hitting twice.

Cleaver.Name: Cleaver
Cleaver.Description: Deals melee STR-based Cut damage to one enemy.

Tornado.Name: Tornado
Tornado.Description: Deals melee STR-based Cut damage to one enemy and enemies adjacent to them.

Allslash.Name: Allslash
Allslash.Description: Deals melee STR-based Cut damage to 2 to 4 enemies. Each enemy can only be hit once.

Hypercut.Name: Hypercut
Hypercut.Description: Deals melee STR-based Cut damage to one enemy.

Riskcut.Name: Riskcut
Riskcut.Description: Deals melee STR-based Cut damage to one enemy. The damage increases when the Landsknecht's HP falls under certain thresholds.

Deathaxe.Name: Deathaxe
Deathaxe.Description: Deals melee STR-based Bash damage to one enemy.

Silencer.Name: Silencer
Silencer.Description: Deals melee STR-based Bash damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict head bind.

Brawn.Name: Brawn
Brawn.Description: Deals melee STR-based Bash damage to one enemy.

Lifeaxe.Name: Lifeaxe
Lifeaxe.Description: Deals melee STR-based Cut damage to one enemy. The damage decreases when the Landsknecht's HP falls under certain thresholds.

Stunner.Name: Stunner
Stunner.Description: Deals melee STR-based Bash damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict stun.

WarCry.Name: War Cry
WarCry.Description: Increases the Landsknecht's physical attack at the cost of their physical defense for 5 turns.

Blazer.Name: Blazer
Blazer.Description: A single target Fire attack on an enemy that was just dealt fire damage.

Freezer.Name: Freezer
Freezer.Description: A single target Ice attack on an enemy that was just dealt ice damage.

Shocker.Name: Shocker
Shocker.Description: A single target Volt attack on an enemy that was just dealt volt damage.

Unbound.Name: Unbound
Unbound.Description: Removes binds from one party member.

AllOut.Name: Force: All Out
AllOut.Description: Deals melee STR-based Cut damage to all enemies.

MineL.Name: Mine
MineL.Description: Mine for materials at item points.

Bows.Name: Bows
Bows.Description: Needed to learn Bow skills. Passively increases damage dealt with Bows.

Velocity.Name: Velocity
Velocity.Description: Increases the Survivalist's AGI for 5 turns.

Slowstep.Name: Slowstep
Slowstep.Description: Forces the targeted party member to act last.
Slowstep.Note: This skill is bugged. What was supposed to happen was that levels 1 through 7 would have a chance of failure, but the game does not check for the success rate at all. Meaning that by default, the success rate is 100% at all levels.

Ambush.Name: Ambush
Ambush.Description: Passively increases the chance of your party getting a preemptive attack on enemies. Will not work for guaranteed blindside encounters.

Sagacity.Name: Sagacity
Sagacity.Description: Passively decreases the chance of enemies blindsiding your party. Will not work for guaranteed blindside encounters.

1stHit.Name: 1st Hit
1stHit.Description: Passively gives the Survivalist a chance to act first in a turn.

Trueshot.Name: Trueshot
Trueshot.Description: Deals ranged STR-based Stab damage to one enemy.

2Bolt.Name: 2-Bolt
2Bolt.Description: Deals 2 instances of ranged STR-based Stab damage to random enemies. Can hit the same enemy multiple times.
2Bolt.Note: The targets are predetermined when the Survivalist attacks. If an enemy was targeted to take multiple hits, but dies before the rest of those hits come out, they will simply disappear and will not get redirected to other enemies.

Sleeper.Name: Sleeper
Sleeper.Description: Deals ranged STR-based Stab damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict sleep.

Number.Name: Number
Number.Description: Deals ranged STR-based Stab damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict paralysis.

Poisoner.Name: Poisoner
Poisoner.Description: Deals ranged STR-based Stab damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict poison.

Apollon.Name: Apollon
Apollon.Description: When used, the Survivalist fires off a shot into the air. Two turns later, it will come down at the start of the turn, dealing ranged STR-based Stab damage to one enemy.
Apollon.Note: The skill cannot be used again until the shot comes down. If the Survivalist is incapacitated on the turn the shot comes down, it will not hit the enemy.

1stTurn.Name: 1st Turn
1stTurn.Description: Forces the targeted party member to act first.
1stTurn.Note: This skill is bugged. What was supposed to happen was that levels 1 through 7 would have a chance of failure, but the game does not check for the success rate at all. Meaning that by default, the success rate is 100% at all levels.

Baitstep.Name: Baitstep
Baitstep.Description: Increases the Survivalist's evasion and the chance of being targeted by enemies for 5 turns.

PatrolS.Name: Patrol
PatrolS.Description: Can only be used on the field. Lowers damage taken from damage tiles for a set number of steps.

Foesense.Name: Foesense
Foesense.Description: Can only be used on the field. Reveals all FOEs on the map for a set number of steps.        .

Stalker.Name: Stalker
Stalker.Description: Can only be used on the field. Lowers the encounter rate by lowering the danger value of tiles for a set number of steps.

MineS.Name: Mine
MineS.Description: Mine for materials at item points.

TakeS.Name: Take
TakeS.Description: Take for materials at item points.

ChopS.Name: Chop
ChopS.Description: Chop for materials at item points.

Airwalk.Name: Force: Airwalk
Airwalk.Description: Increases the party's evasion by for 5 turns.

Shields.Name: Shields
Shields.Description: Needed to learn shield skills. Passively decreases the damage the Protector takes from all damage types.

Aegis.Name: Aegis
Aegis.Description: If the Protector dies, this passive has a chance to revive them with 1 HP. Only works once per battle. Won't activate if the Protector gets killed by instant death.

En GardeP.Name: En Garde
En GardeP.Description: Passively gives the Protector a chance to reduce any instance of damage they take by 50%.

HP Regen.Name: HP Regen
HP Regen.Description: Passively restores the Protector's HP at the end of each turn.

Riskwall.Name: Riskwall
Riskwall.Description: Passively decreases the amount of damage the Protector takes from all damage types. The damage reduction increases when the Protector's HP falls under certain thresholds.

Smite.Name: Smite
Smite.Description: Deals melee STR-based Bash damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict arm bind. The defense value on the Protector's shield is used for Weapon Attack in the damage formula.

Front Guard.Name: Front Guard
Front Guard.Description: At the start of the turn, the Protector prepares to reduce the amount of damage the front row takes from physical attacks for the current turn. Remains active until the turn ends or the Protector dies. Every time the skill activates, the chance of it activating again is reduced. The base activation rate is 100% at all levels.

Back Guard.Name: Back Guard
Back Guard.Description: At the start of the turn, the Protector prepares to reduce the amount of damage the Back row takes from physical attacks for the current turn. Remains active until the turn ends or the Protector dies. Every time the skill activates, the chance of it activating again is reduced. The base activation rate is 100% at all levels.

A. Guard.Name: A. Guard
A. Guard.Description: At the start of the turn, the Protector prepares to reduce the amount of damage the entire party takes from physical attacks for the current turn. Remains active until the turn ends or the Protector dies. Every time the skill activates, the chance of it activating again is reduced. The base activation rate is 100% at all levels.

1 Guard.Name: 1 Guard
1 Guard.Description: At the start of the turn, the Protector prepares to reduce the amount of damage one party member takes from physical attacks for the current turn. Remains active until the turn ends or the Protector dies. Every time the skill activates, the chance of it activating again is reduced. The base activation rate is 100% at all levels.

Antifire.Name: Antifire
Antifire.Description: At the start of the turn, the Protector prepares to reduce the amount of damage the entire party takes from fire attacks for the current turn. Remains active until the turn ends or the Protector dies. From levels 1 through 9, every time the skill activates, the chance of it activating again is reduced. The base activation rate is 100% at all levels. At level 10, the skill will always activate. At levels 1 through 7, the damage is simply reduced. At levels 8 through 10, the effects of the attack are completely nullified, meaning that any status effects attached to those attacks will not take effect. At levels 9 and 10, the damage is not nullified, but ends up being absorbed and heals the party instead.

Anticold.Name: Anticold
Anticold.Description: At the start of the turn, the Protector prepares to reduce the amount of damage the entire party takes from ice attacks for the current turn. Remains active until the turn ends or the Protector dies. From levels 1 through 9, every time the skill activates, the chance of it activating again is reduced. The base activation rate is 100% at all levels. At level 10, the skill will always activate. At levels 1 through 7, the damage is simply reduced. At levels 8 through 10, the effects of the attack are completely nullified, meaning that any status effects attached to those attacks will not take effect. At levels 9 and 10, the damage is not nullified, but ends up being absorbed and heals the party instead.

Antivolt.Name: Antivolt
Antivolt.Description: At the start of the turn, the Protector prepares to reduce the amount of damage the entire party takes from volt attacks for the current turn. Remains active until the turn ends or the Protector dies. From levels 1 through 9, every time the skill activates, the chance of it activating again is reduced. The base activation rate is 100% at all levels. At level 10, the skill will always activate. At levels 1 through 7, the damage is simply reduced. At levels 8 through 10, the effects of the attack are completely nullified, meaning that any status effects attached to those attacks will not take effect. At levels 9 and 10, the damage is not nullified, but ends up being absorbed and heals the party instead.

Antiall.Name: Antiall
Antiall.Description: At the start of the turn, the Protector prepares to reduce the amount of damage the entire party takes from elemental attacks for the current turn. Remains active until the turn ends or the Protector dies. Every time the skill activates, the chance of it activating again is reduced. The base activation rate is 100% at all levels. At levels 1 through 4, the damage is simply reduced. At level 5, the effects of the attack are completely nullified, meaning that any status effects attached to those attacks will not take effect. The damage taken is also absorbed and heals the party instead.

Fortify.Name: Fortify
Fortify.Description: Increases the Protector's physical defense for 5 turns.

Provoke.Name: Provoke
Provoke.Description: Increases the Protector's physical defense and the chance of being targeted by enemies for 5 turns.

Parry.Name: Parry
Parry.Description: At the start of the turn, the Protector prepares to reduce any damage they take from any melee physical attacks for the current turn. Remains active until the turn ends or the Protector dies. Every time the skill activates, the chance of it activating again is reduced. The base activation rate is 100% at all levels.

RefreshP.Name: Refresh
RefreshP.Description: Dispels certain status ailments from one party member. Which ailments are dispelled depends on the skill's level. Cannot dispel petrification, no matter how high its level is. Dispels certain status ailments from the entire party. Which ailments are dispelled depends on the skill's level. The higher the skill's level, the more ailments that can be dispelled. Cannot dispel petrification, no matter how high its level is.

Flee.Name: Flee
Flee.Description: When used, the Protector has a chance to escape from the battle at the start of the turn. If you visited multiple floors during one trip to the Labyrinth, there is a chance to warp back to the previous floor and the last set of stairs used. Otherwise the skill only functions as another escape method. The warp aspect works even if you get cornered by an FOE. If the skill is used on the first turn of a preemptive attack, the escape and warp activation rate is always 100%, no matter what level the skill is at. The escape rate and warp activation rates have separate checks. Cannot work in boss battles, no matter what the circumstances.

Painless.Name: Force: Painless
Painless.Description: The Protector sets up the perfect defense at the start of the turn, nullifying any damage taken and prevents any status effects or binds from landing until the end of the turn. Does not affect debuffs or buff dispels.

Whips.Name: Whips
Whips.Description: Needed to learn whip skills. Passively increases damage dealt with whips.

Swords.Name: Swords
Swords.Description: Needed to learn sword skills. Passively increases damage dealt with swords.

Antisick/Antibind.Name: Antisick/Antibind
Antisick/Antibind.Description: Passively increases the Dark Hunter's resistance to ailments/binds.

Viper.Name: Viper
Viper.Description: Deals melee STR-based Cut damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict poison.

Shackles/Cuffs/Gag.Name: Shackles/Cuffs/Gag
Shackles/Cuffs/Gag.Description: Deals melee STR-based Cut damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict leg bind/arm bind/head bind.

Ecstasy.Name: Ecstasy
Ecstasy.Description: If used against an enemy that is fully bound, a massive amount of melee STR-based Cut damage is dealt. Otherwise, the Dark Hunter only deals 100% damage.

Climax.Name: Climax
Climax.Description: Targets one enemy. If they are under a certain HP threshold, they are instantly killed, and the Dark Hunter is healed for any HP they had remaining. If the enemy is over the HP threshold, the skill will always miss. If the enemy is under the HP threshold, but is immune to instant death, the Dark Hunter only deals 100% melee STR-based Cut damage to them instead. Accuracy is only checked for in that case. Climax does not have a success rate. It cannot miss if the target is under the HP threshold and is not immune to instant death.

Hypnos/Nerve.Name: Hypnos/Nerve
Hypnos/Nerve.Description: Deals melee STR-based Cut damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict sleep/paralysis.

Mirage.Name: Mirage
Mirage.Description: Deals melee STR-based Cut damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict confusion.

Drain.Name: Drain
Drain.Description: Deals melee STR-based Cut damage to one enemy. The Dark Hunter is healed for a portion of the damage they deal.

Petrify.Name: Petrify
Petrify.Description: Deals melee STR-based Cut damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict petrification.

Bait/Magibait.Name: Bait/Magibait
Bait/Magibait.Description: At the start of the turn, the Dark Hunter sets up a trap. If they or any party member adjacent to them get attacked with a physical/elemental attack, the Dark Hunter has a chance of dealing melee STR-based Cut damage to the attacker. The counters will still activate even if the damage taken was nullified through the use of methods such as Painless.

Unbind.Name: Unbind
Unbind.Description: Removes binds from one party member.

Racket.Name: Racket
Racket.Description: Can only be used on the field. Any non-red FOEs within a certain range will be lured to the tile this skill gets used on. Once they reach that tile, they will be stunned for a set duration.

Dominate.Name: Force: Dominate
Dominate.Description: Binds an enemy's head, arms, and legs with a 10000% success rate. Nothing in the game is immune to any bind, so it is guaranteed to work. Has a 1% speed modifier.

Healer.Name: Healer
Healer.Description: Needed to learn healing skills. Passively increases the amount of HP restored through non-fixed sources.

Patch Up.Name: Patch Up
Patch Up.Description: Passively restores a percentage of each party member's max HP at the end of each battle.

TP Regen.Name: TP Regen
TP Regen.Description: Passively restores the Medic's TP at the end of each turn.

ScavengeM.Name: Scavenge
ScavengeM.Description: Passively increases the drop rate for each item the enemy has. The increase is additive and stacks with other instances of Scavenge.

Cure 3M.Name: Cure 3
Cure 3M.Description: Fully restores one party member's HP.

Salve 3.Name: Salve 3
Salve 3.Description: Fully restores the entire party's HP.

Revive.Name: Revive
Revive.Description: Brings a dead party member back to life.

UnbindM.Name: Unbind
UnbindM.Description: Removes binds from one party member.

Freedom.Name: Freedom
Freedom.Description: Removes binds from the entire party.

RefreshM.Name: Refresh
RefreshM.Description: Dispels certain status ailments from the entire party. Which ailments are dispelled depends on the skill's level. The higher the skill's level, the more ailments that can be dispelled.

Purify.Name: Purify
Purify.Description: Dispels certain status ailments from the entire party. Which ailments are dispelled depends on the skill's level. The higher the skill's level, the more ailments that can be dispelled. Cannot dispel petrification, no matter how high its level is.

Caduceus.Name: Caduceus
Caduceus.Description: Deals melee STR-based Bash damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict stun.

CPR.Name: CPR
CPR.Description: Places a buff on the entire party that has a chance of reviving them with 1 HP when they die. The buff lasts for 5 turns. Once the party member gets revived, the buff is dispelled.

Phoenix.Name: Phoenix
Phoenix.Description: When used, the Medic's life is sacrificed to heal and revive the rest of the party.

PatrolM.Name: Patrol
PatrolM.Description: Can only be used on the field. Lowers damage taken from damage tiles for a set number of steps.

H. Touch.Name: Force: H. Touch
H. Touch.Description: Fully heals and revives the entire party, along with dispelling any status ailments they have. Has no effect on binds or stuns. Has a speed modifier of 1%.

Fire Up.Name: Fire Up
Fire Up.Description: Needed to learn Fire spells. Passively increases damage dealt with Fire spells.

Ice Up.Name: Ice Up
Ice Up.Description: Needed to learn Ice spells. Passively increases damage dealt with Ice spells.

Volt Up.Name: Volt Up
Volt Up.Description: Needed to learn Volt spells. Passively increases damage dealt with Volt spells.

Phys Up.Name: Phys Up
Phys Up.Description: Needed to learn physical spells. Passively increases damage dealt with physical spells.

Analysis.Name: Analysis
Analysis.Description: When the Alchemist strikes a weakness with one of their spells, the enemies in question take even more damage. Only affects spells. A weakness is counted as a damage resistance of 110% or above.

Fire/Ice/Volt.Name: Fire/Ice/Volt
Fire/Ice/Volt.Description: Deals ranged TEC-based Fire/Ice/Volt damage to one enemy.

Flame/Freeze/Thunder.Name: Flame/Freeze/Thunder
Flame/Freeze/Thunder.Description: Deals ranged TEC-based Fire/Ice/Volt damage to one enemy. A 1.5x damage multiplier is applied to the Alchemist's base damage when using these skills.

Inferno/Cocytus/Thor.Name: Inferno/Cocytus/Thor
Inferno/Cocytus/Thor.Description: Deals ranged TEC-based Fire/Ice/Volt damage to all enemies.

Blades/Gravity/Piercing.Name: Blades/Gravity/Piercing
Blades/Gravity/Piercing.Description: Deals ranged TEC-based Cut/Bash/Stab damage to all enemies.

Megido.Name: Megido
Megido.Description: Deals ranged TEC-based untyped damage to one enemy. Has no damage type, so it ignores damage resistances altogether. A 1.5x damage multiplier is applied to the Alchemist's base damage when using this skill.

Return.Name: Return
Return.Description: Can only be used in the field. Teleports the party to the last Geomagnetic Field they used. Has no effect if they came in from the entrance of the Labyrinth.

Eschaton.Name: Force: Eschaton
Eschaton.Description: Deals ranged TEC-based untyped damage to all enemies. Has no damage type, so it ignores damage resistances altogether. A 1.5x damage multiplier is applied to the Alchemist's base damage when using this skill. Has a spell power of 200. Has a speed modifier of 300%. Has an accuracy modifier of 300%.

Songs.Name: Songs
Songs.Description: Needed to learn song skills. Passively increases speed of song skills.

Divinity.Name: Divinity
Divinity.Description: Passively increases the amount of EXP the party gains after battle. Stacks with other instances of Divinity.

Bravery.Name: Bravery
Bravery.Description: Increases the party's damage output for the duration of the battle. The damage buff is applied directly to the party members' base damage, so untyped attacks such as the Alchemist's Megido skill are also affected.

Shelter.Name: Shelter
Shelter.Description: Decreases the amount of damage the party takes for the duration of the battle.

Mercury.Name: Mercury
Mercury.Description: Increases the party's AGI for the duration of the battle.

Stamina.Name: Stamina
Stamina.Description: Increases the party's maximum HP for the duration of the battle. When cast, the party's current HP will not be set to the new maximum.

Blaze/Frost/Shock.Name: Blaze/Frost/Shock
Blaze/Frost/Shock.Description: Imbues one party member's weapon with Fire/Ice/Volt, enabling them to deal Fire/Ice/Volt damage with their normal attacks.

Ifrit/Ymir/Taranis.Name: Ifrit/Ymir/Taranis
Ifrit/Ymir/Taranis.Description: Places a buff on the entire party that increases their resistance to Fire/Ice/Volt and places a debuff on all enemies that decreases their resistance to Fire/Ice/Volt. The buff lasts for the duration of the battle, while the debuff lasts for 5 turns.

Health.Name: Health
Health.Description: Places a buff on the entire party that reduces the chances of enemies inflicting status ailments on the party for the entire battle.

Recovery.Name: Recovery
Recovery.Description: Places a buff on the entire party that increases the rate at which they recover from status effects.

Danger.Name: Danger
Danger.Description: Increases the encounter rate by increasing the danger value of tiles for a set number of steps.

Luring.Name: Luring
Luring.Description: Any non-red FOEs within a certain range will be lured to the tile this skill gets used on.

Slumber.Name: Slumber
Slumber.Description: Any non-red FOEs within a certain range will be stunned for a set duration.

Crusade.Name: Force: Crusade
Crusade.Description: When cast, the party has their attack and defense increased by 50%, and their maximum HP is doubled for the duration of the battle. The attack up, defense up, and maximum HP components all count as 3 separate buffs. For the purposes of overriding buffs, the ATK Up buff is placed first, the DEF Up buff is placed second, and the HP MAX Up buff is placed last. Meaning that any new buff will immediately override the ATK Up buff first. Has a speed modifier of 200%.

Shiraha.Name: Shiraha
Shiraha.Description: Passively gives the Ronin a chance to nullify any damage they take. Does not count as evasion, and is completely independent of the Ronin's stats or any evasion boosts they may have.

Overhead.Name: Overhead
Overhead.Description: Needed to learn Overhead stance skills. Passively increases damage dealt with Overhead skills.

Seigan.Name: Seigan
Seigan.Description: Needed to learn Seigan stance skills. Passively increases damage dealt with Seigan skills.

Iai.Name: Iai
Iai.Description: Needed to learn Iai stance skills. Passively increases damage dealt with Iai skills.

Clarity.Name: Clarity
Clarity.Description: Passively increases the Ronin's evasion. The evasion boost increases when the Ronin's HP falls under certain thresholds.

Sayageki.Name: Sayageki
Sayageki.Description: Deals melee STR-based Bash damage to one enemy.

Zamba.Name: Zamba
Zamba.Description: Deals melee STR-based Cut damage to one enemy.

Midareba.Name: Midareba
Midareba.Description: Deals multiple instances of melee STR-based Cut damage to one enemy.

Koteuchi.Name: Koteuchi
Koteuchi.Description: Deals melee STR-based Stab damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict arm bind.

Getsuei.Name: Getsuei
Getsuei.Description: Deals melee STR-based Stab damage to one enemy.

Issen.Name: Force: Issen
Issen.Description: Deals 500% melee STR-based Cut damage to all enemies. Has a 50% chance to inflict instant death. Has a 1% speed modifier. Has a 100% accuracy modifier.

Curses.Name: Curses
Curses.Description: Needed to learn curse skills. Has absolutely no effect otherwise.

Scavenge.Name: Scavenge
Scavenge.Description: Passively increases the drop rate for each item the enemy has. The increase is additive and stacks with other instances of Scavenge.

Sapping.Name: Sapping
Sapping.Description: Decreases all enemies' damage output for 5 turns.

Frailty.Name: Frailty
Frailty.Description: Decreases all enemies' defense for 5 turns. This is a resistance multiplier, and untyped attacks will not deal more damage against enemies with this debuff.

Leaden.Name: Leaden
Leaden.Description: Decreases all enemies agility for 5 turns.

Dampen.Name: Dampen
Dampen.Description: Adjusts an enemy's damage resistances to remove any resistances or immunities they have for 5 turns.

Cranial/Abdomen/Immobile.Name: Cranial/Abdomen/Immobile
Cranial/Abdomen/Immobile.Description: Attempts to inflict head bind/arm bind/leg bind on one enemy.

Blinding/Torpor/Evil Eye/Paralysis/Corru.Name: Blinding/Torpor/Evil Eye/Paralysis/Corrupt
Blinding/Torpor/Evil Eye/Paralysis/Corru.Description: Attempts to inflict blind/sleep/fear/paralysis/curse on all enemies.

Poison.Name: Poison
Poison.Description: Attempts to inflict poison on all enemies.

Suicide/Betrayal/Paralyze.Name: Suicide/Betrayal/Paralyze
Suicide/Betrayal/Paralyze.Description: Targets one enemy at the start of the turn. If that enemy is inflicted with fear, they will attack themselves a number of times/attack a random enemy once/do nothing for the turn.

Revenge.Name: Revenge
Revenge.Description: Deals ranged untyped damage to one enemy based on how much HP the Hexer is missing.

Caprice.Name: Force: Caprice
Caprice.Description: Attempts to inflict every single status ailment at once on all enemies. How this skill works is that there is a priority system in place. First, the skill tries to inflict stun. Afterward, whether the attempt was successful or not, the skill then attempts to inflict all status ailments in this order: Instant death > Petrify > Fear > Curse > Poison > Sleep > Confuse > Paralyze > Blind. The game will continue checking for each status effect until one is applied, or none get applied, and repeats the process for the next enemy. If poison is the ailment chosen, it will deal 350 poison damage. Has an infliction rate of 95%. Has a speed modifier of 500%.

Guns.Name: Guns
Guns.Description: Needed to learn gun skills. Passively increases damage dealt with guns.

2-HitG.Name: 2-HitG
2-HitG.Description: Normal attacks have a chance of hitting twice.

Weakshot.Name: Weakshot
Weakshot.Description: Passively increases the chance that a normal attack will become a critical hit. The chance from this passive is added onto the Gunner's critical hit rate.

Legshot.Name: Legshot
Legshot.Description: Deals ranged STR-based Stab damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict leg bind.

Riskshot.Name: Riskshot
Riskshot.Description: At the start of the turn, the Gunner prepares to deal ranged STR-based Stab damage to one enemy. Until they fire the shot, they will take extra damage from all attacks.

Stunshot.Name: Stunshot
Stunshot.Description: Deals ranged STR-based Stab damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict stun.

Snipe.Name: Snipe
Snipe.Description: Deals ranged STR-based Stab damage to one enemy. Cannot miss under any circumstances, even if the Gunner has their head bound or is blind.

Fireshot.Name: Fireshot
Fireshot.Description: Deals ranged STR-based Fire damage to one enemy.

Riskfire.Name: Riskfire
Riskfire.Description: At the start of the turn, the Gunner prepares to deal Fire damage but takes extra damage until the shot is fired.

Wildshot.Name: Wildshot
Wildshot.Description: Deals ranged STR-based Stab damage to all enemies.

Ricochet.Name: Ricochet
Ricochet.Description: Deals several instances of ranged STR-based Stab damage to random enemies. Can hit the same enemy multiple times. The targets are predetermined when the Gunner attacks.

Medishot.Name: Medishot
Medishot.Description: Dispels certain status ailments from the entire party. Cannot dispel petrification.

Haltshot.Name: Haltshot
Haltshot.Description: Can only be used on the field. Any non-red FOEs within a certain range will be stunned for a set duration.

War Edge.Name: War Edge
War Edge.Description: Needed to learn sword skills. Passively increases damage dealt with swords.

War Lore.Name: War Lore
War Lore.Description: Needed to learn healing skills. Passively increases the amount of HP restored through non-fixed sources.

Regenall.Name: Regenall
Regenall.Description: Passively restores the entire party's HP at the end of each turn.

Blindcut.Name: Blindcut
Blindcut.Description: Deals melee STR-based untyped damage to one enemy. Has no damage type, so it ignores damage resistances altogether. If the enemy is inflicted with blind, they have a chance to be inflicted with head bind/leg bind/arm bind.

Venomcut.Name: Venomcut
Venomcut.Description: Deals melee STR-based untyped damage to one enemy. Has no damage type, so it ignores damage resistances altogether. If the enemy is inflicted with poison, they have a chance to be inflicted with head bind/leg bind/arm bind.

Stuncut.Name: Stuncut
Stuncut.Description: Deals melee STR-based untyped damage to one enemy. Has no damage type, so it ignores damage resistances altogether. If the enemy is inflicted with paralysis, they have a chance to be inflicted with head bind/leg bind/arm bind.

Sleepcut.Name: Sleepcut
Sleepcut.Description: Deals melee STR-based untyped damage to one enemy. Has no damage type, so it ignores damage resistances altogether. If the enemy is inflicted with sleep, they will take extra damage.

Fearcut.Name: Fearcut
Fearcut.Description: Deals melee STR-based untyped damage to one enemy. Has no damage type, so it ignores damage resistances altogether. If the enemy is inflicted with fear, the War Magus is healed for a portion of the damage they deal.

Cursecut.Name: Cursecut
Cursecut.Description: Deals melee STR-based untyped damage to one enemy. Has no damage type, so it ignores damage resistances altogether. If the enemy is inflicted with curse, the War Magus restores some TP equal to a portion of the damage they deal.

Cure 3W.Name: Cure 3
Cure 3W.Description: Fully restores one party member's HP.

Warmight.Name: Warmight
Warmight.Description: Increases one party member's damage output for 5 turns. The damage buff is applied directly to the party members' base damage, so untyped attacks such as the Alchemist's Megido skill are also affected.

Rockskin.Name: Rockskin
Rockskin.Description: Decreases the amount of damage one party member takes for 5 turns.

Elkspeed.Name: Elkspeed
Elkspeed.Description: Increases one party member's AGI for 5 turns.

Transfer.Name: Transfer
Transfer.Description: Spends some of the War Magus' TP to restore one party member's TP.

Loyalty.Name: Loyalty
Loyalty.Description: Passively gives the Beast a chance to take damage in another party member's place. Can activate multiple times per turn. When Loyalty activates, the defensive stats and buffs on the party member being defended get applied to the Beast, not their own. Has priority over the Protector's guarding skills, meaning that the Beast will take damage before those skills can mitigate them. Since this skill is a passive, it cannot be turned off once learned.

Autocure.Name: Autocure
Autocure.Description: Passively restores a percentage of the Beast's max HP at the end of each battle.

Autoheal.Name: Autoheal
Autoheal.Description: Passively gives the Beast a chance to recover from any status effects at the start of the turn. This is not related to Recover Chance.

(B) En Garde.Name: (B) En Garde
(B) En Garde.Description: Passively gives the Protector a chance to reduce any instance of damage they take by 50%. Does not work with Loyalty activations.

Tenacity.Name: Tenacity
Tenacity.Description: If the Beast dies, this passive has a chance to revive them with 1 HP. Won't activate if the Beast is killed by instant death. Works with Loyalty activations.

Maul.Name: Maul
Maul.Description: Deals melee STR-based Bash damage to one enemy. The damage increases when the Beast's HP falls under certain thresholds.

Devour.Name: Devour
Devour.Description: Deals melee STR-based Bash damage to one enemy. The Beast is healed for a portion of the damage they deal.

Bodyslam.Name: Bodyslam
Bodyslam.Description: Deals melee STR-based Bash damage to one enemy. Has a chance to inflict stun.

Rampage.Name: Rampage
Rampage.Description: Deals several instances of ranged STR-based Bash damage to random enemies. Can hit the same enemy multiple times. The targets are predetermined when the Beast attacks.

Claw.Name: Claw
Claw.Description: Deals melee STR-based Cut damage to one enemy.
